info.description: REST API untuk aplikasi blog Develapar dengan fitur lengkap untuk manajemen artikel, komentar, kategori, tag, bookmark, dan like. API menggunakan standard response format dengan metadata, request tracking, rate limiting, dan comprehensive error handling.
info.title: Develapar API

get.description: Get a list of tags associated with a specific article ID

parameters.description: ID of the article to retrieve tags for
parameters.name: article_id

200.description: List of tags for the article

post.description: Assigns a list of tags (by name) to a specific article
post.summary: Assign tags to an article by tag names

delete.description: Remove a specific tag from an article by their IDs
delete.summary: Remove a tag from an article

parameters.description: ID of the tag to remove
parameters.name: tag_id

400.description: Invalid article ID or tag ID

get.description: Get a list of all blog articles

post.description: Create a new blog article with tags

get.description: Get a list of articles by a specific user ID

parameters.description: ID of the user whose articles to retrieve
parameters.name: user_id

get.description: Get a paginated list of articles by a specific user ID
get.summary: Get articles by user ID with pagination

parameters.description: ID of the user whose articles to retrieve
parameters.name: user_id

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Paginated list of articles by user

400.description: Invalid user ID or pagination parameters

get.description: Get a list of articles by category name

parameters.description: Name of the category to retrieve articles from
parameters.name: category_name

get.description: Get a paginated list of articles by category name
get.summary: Get articles by category name with pagination

parameters.description: Name of the category to retrieve articles from
parameters.name: category_name

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Paginated list of articles by category

get.description: Get a paginated list of all blog articles

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)
parameters.name: limit

put.description: Update an existing article by ID

parameters.description: ID of the article to update
parameters.name: article_id

403.description: Forbidden (user does not own the article)

parameters.description: ID of the article to delete
parameters.name: article_id

403.description: Forbidden (user does not own the article)

get.description: Get article details by its slug

parameters.description: Slug of the article to retrieve
parameters.name: slug

post.description: Authenticate user and return access token
Refresh access token using refresh token from cookie
Register a new user with name, email, and password
Create a new bookmark for an article

delete.description: Delete a bookmark for an article by article ID

get.description: Check if a specific article is bookmarked by the authenticated user
get.summary: Check if an article is bookmarked by the current user

parameters.description: ID of the article to check
parameters.name: article_id

get.description: Get a list of bookmarks for a specific user ID

parameters.description: ID of the user whose bookmarks to retrieve
parameters.name: user_id

200.description: List of bookmarks for the user

get.description: Get a list of all categories

parameters.name: category_id

get.description: Get comprehensive application and database health status with context
Get detailed database connection pool statistics with context
Get comprehensive health information with individual check results

get.description: Get comprehensive application metrics including request, database, application, and error metrics
Get application-level metrics including memory usage, goroutine count, and uptime
Get database performance metrics including query times, connection pool stats, and error rates
Get error tracking metrics including error rates, error types, and error distribution
Get HTTP request metrics including latency, throughput, and status code distribution

post.description: Reset all collected metrics to zero (useful for testing or periodic resets)

get.description: Get a high-level summary of key metrics for dashboard display
Get a paginated list of all product categories

parameters.description: Number of items per page (default: 10, max: 100)

dto.APIResponse.description: Standard API response format with metadata and context information

success.description: Indicates if the request was successful

dto.ErrorResponse.description: Error response structure with detailed error information

has_next.description: Whether there is a next page

has_prev.description: Whether there is a previous page

dto.ResponseMetadata.description: Response metadata containing request tracking and performance information

BearerAuth.description: Type "Bearer" followed by a space and JWT token.
